projects.name: QuizCraft
projects.description: QuizCraft is a virtual classroom platform that allows teachers to monitor students progress. The platform leverages AI to generate quizzes and tests based on the content of the course. QuizCraft was designed to streamline educators workflow and enhance the learning experience for students.
projects.contribution: I was responsible for creatingthe entire authentication system through Firebase, as well as account and classroom functionality, and implemented all the relevant designs created by our UX designer. The users would be created through Firebase and then their additional information would be stored with MongoDB. I also worked on the backend, setting up the database and creating the API endpoints for the frontend to consume.

projects.name: ChainWork
projects.description: Chainwork is a decentralized platform allowing users to post tasks and get paid via the Electroneum blockchain. Chainwork utilizes smart contracts to ensure secure and transparent transactions between users. The platform is designed to provide a seamless experience for both task posters and workers, with a focus on security and ease of use.
projects.contribution: I was responsible for implementing the blockchain payment integration system, using the MetaMask browser extension. This included building a secure wallet connection system using ethers.js, developing fiat-to-cryptocurrency conversion features with the CoinGecko API, and creating a complete transaction flow for task creation with escrow payments. Initially designed using a context-based architecture for centralized state management and later refactored to a more modular service-based approach for better maintainability.

projects.name: Best Buds Florist
projects.description: For my final college project I built an e-commerce website for a fictional florist shop. with a fully functional payment system using Stripe API. The website also features an authentication system utilizing Django-allauth, as well a blog section.

projects.name: Shannon Muay Thai Academy
projects.description: A website that I built for my local Muay Thai Kickboxing gym. It features a booking system where users can create accounts and book private sessions.
